page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT BRYNFORD
page.content: Some people work in qarries. These are some of the jobs they do crush stone with a steel ball, take stone to places in lorries for road making, some people work in offices and others service the lorries. People work on farms as well. They mark the sheep to know which are theirs.They dip the sheep to get the tics and other things out of the wool. In the summer the sheep are sheared because if they are not sheared the flies will lay maggot eggs. The maggots get over the wool and the wool is no use for clothes because it will be too dirty. A few months after the sheep are sheared they are dipped in sheep_dip to destroy the maggots in the wool.
